imdb.plot outline: The Beaumonts: The Kentucky Bourbon Series is a highly-anticipated series surrounding life and business within the bourbon industry. The series takes place in Kentucky surrounding rival families within the bourbon business. Inspired by the hit television drama Dallas, comes a series about a new family business, greed, corruption, money and power.
imdb.title: The Beaumonts: The Kentucky Bourbon Series
akas: The Beaumonts: The Kentucky Bourbon Series (United States)
plot: _The Beaumonts: The Kentucky Bourbon Series_ (qv) is a highly-anticipated series surrounding life and business within the bourbon industry. The series takes place in Kentucky surrounding rival families within the bourbon business. Inspired by the hit television drama Dallas, comes a series about a new family business, greed, corruption, money and power.
